name: Steel Defender
hit_dice: 2 + your Intelligence modifier + five times your artificer level (the defender has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equad to your artificer level)

traits.name: Dive Attack
traits.desc: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage to the target.

actions.name: Force-Empowered Rend.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: ld8 + PB force damage.

actions.name: Repair (3/Day).
actions.desc: The magical mechanisms inside the defender restore 2d8 + PB hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

reactions.name: Deflect Attack.
reactions.desc: The defender imposes disadvantage o n the attack roll ofone creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the defender.
